title: Incessant rains continue in Karnataka, Bengaluru may witness downpour - The News Minute
content:
1. Incessant rains continue in Karnataka, Bengaluru may witness downpour  The News Minute
  2. Heavy Rainfall In Bengaluru Unleashes A Flood Of Memes On Twitter  NDTV
  3. Bengaluru's Heavy Rains Flooded Our House Within an Hour | The Quint  The Quint
  4. Brand Bengaluru not rain ready yet  The New Indian Express
  5. Heavy rains: Udupi DC declares holiday for all schools, PU colleges on May 20  Daijiworld.com
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Heavy downpour continued to wreak havoc in various parts of Karnataka including Bengaluru for the third consecutive day on Thursday, May 19. More rains are in store for the state, as the India Meteorological Department (IMD) has issued a red warning in six districts — Uttara Kannada, Davanagere, Shivamogga, Udupi, Dakshina Kannada and Chikkamagaluru for May 19. Two other districts — Hassan and Kodagu — are under an orange warning, while a yellow warning has been issued for the rest of the state.
